code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import TextInput from"../components/TextInput";import Button from"../components/Button";import ResultDisplay from"../components/ResultDisplay";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MainPage=()=>{const[userInput,setUserInput]=useState("");const[result,setResult]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post("/api/process",{message:userInput});setResult(response.data.result);}catch(error){console.error("Error:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextInput,{value:userInput,onChange:e=>setUserInput(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleSubmit,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Submit"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResultDisplay,{title:userInput,content:result})]});};export default MainPage;
